resources.string: \ Sudoku is a logic-based number placement puzzle. Starting with a partially completed 9x9 grid, the objective is to fill the grid so that each row, each column, and each of the 3x3 boxes (also called blocks) contains the digits 1 to 9 exactly once.

\ 
 Prof. Stephen Intille
 http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/intille/
 We are indebted for his constant assistance,
 encouragement, guidance and the tremendous
 support.

 Android Developers
 http://developer.android.com/
 Proved helpful for tutorials on Wear and other
 Android related information.

 MPAndroidChart
 https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart
 Helped us represent the collected data in suitable
 format without needing to reinvent the wheel.

 OpenCSV
 http://opencsv.sourceforge.net/
 Enabled us to record and store data in .csv format.

 IconArchive
 http://www.iconarchive.com/
 Provided us with appropriate images.

\ 
Some good descriptions for activities are:
 		- shopping groceries
 		- washing clothes
 		- preparing lunch
